Notice

The government orders that the Commanders of Brigades, Corps, and Squadrons, as soon as they receive this, proceed to transmit, through the competent channels, to His Excellency

Furthermore, the government recommends that the Commanders of Divisions, Brigades, etc., through whom the said reports must be forwarded, mention the order officers who are not attached or assigned to any of the corps. The government expects from these Commanders a scrupulous examination and great circumspection regarding this requirement.

Secretary of State for War Affairs in Piratini, August 31, 1837. In the absence of His Excellency Senhor Domingos José de Almeida. (a) Antônio Vicente de Siqueira Pereira Leitão.

Illustrious Senhor Colonel João Antônio da Silveira. Commander of the Center Column. Wherever you may be. From the Ministry of the Interior, Finance, and War.
